settings.instruction:
# Computer assisted actor identification

In the following texts, we want to identify all references to the mentioned actors.  To make this task easier and mobile phone friendly, we pre-annotated the actors that we are interested in, and marked potential references to these actors (e.g., pronouns).

The coder then only has to tab on the highlighted words to add or remove actor labels

variables.name: actor
variables.instruction: Add and correct all references to the actors highlighted in this text.
